preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh 200 g of molybdenum (Mo) powder. 
 2. Weigh 160 g of oxygen (O) gas. 
 3. Weigh 80 g of selenium (Se) powder. 
 4. Weigh 40 g of samarium (Sm) powder. 
 5. Mix Mo, Se, and Sm powders in a clean, dry ceramic container using a mortar and pestle until homogeneous.
